structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Building, Vessel Or Vehicle; Breaking And Entering With Intent To Commit Misdemeanor
law.text: Whoever in the nighttime or daytime breaks and enters a building, ship, vessel or vehicle with intent to commit a misdemeanor shall be punished by a fine of not more than two hundred dollars or by imprisonment for not more than six months, or both.
